a.title: Online Book Fair!
a.div:
You're invited to shop our online Book Fair from April 22nd to May 5th! Even though the school is closed, we'd still like to make the Book Fair available for the community.
To view the Online Book Fair, click anywhere in this frame. There is free shipping available for purchases over $25.

a.title: Food Service Survey
a.div:
MPS will begin food service (sack lunch) for anyone ages 1-18. Lunch will be provided as well as breakfast items for the following morning.
Meals can be picked up at the school from 11:00-noon, daily. We will also be delivering meals as needed. If you have daily changes please contact the office.
This service will be offered for the duration of the school closure. Please click anywhere on this message to fill out the survey to let us know if you need service and for how many children. Thank You

img.div:
Hello, Mr. Larson has worked with Gerrell's Sports to create an online store for Bulldogs apparel. The flyer is available for viewing by clicking anywhere on this box. Then you can follow the link within the flyer to make an order online, where you'll enter the code SAR20. If you have any questions, please get a hold of the school.
Thanks!

div.div: We are working on making changes to our website to ensure it is accessible to persons with disabilities. We’d like to know how the website is or isn’t accessible to you. If you would be willing to share your thoughts, we would appreciate it. Please contact Rick Olthoff by e-mail at Rick.Olthoff@k12.nd.us

img.div:
Milnor is located on Highway 13 just 40 miles west of Wahpeton, ND and 11 miles east of Gwinner, ND.
For a small community, Milnor offers many services and amenities, including a medical clinic, ambulance and fire department, community center (the Milnor Area Community Center, known as the MACC, is pictured above), golf course, swimming pool, park and recreational facilities, and a wide variety of retail, professional, and service businesses.

Fax number for Milnor Public School

span.data-emptytext: Milnor Public School provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: The Milnor Public School District is committed to maintaining a learning and working environment free from discrimination and harassment in all employment and educational programs, activities, and facilities. The District prohibits discrimination and harassment based on a student and/or employee’s race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, disability, age or other status protected by law.

p.span: The Milnor Public School District is committed to maintaining a learning and working environment free from discrimination and harassment in all employment and educational programs, activities, and facilities. The District prohibits discrimination and harassment based on a student and/or employee’s race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, disability, age or other status protected by law.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
